summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5489 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest (East Side) from West Graham Street to a connection with the existing concrete walk, 102 feet, more or less, north of West Findlay Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70094, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
